channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Charlie Hall (actor, born 1997)
item.description: Charlie Hall (born May 30, 1997) is an American television and film actor.

item.title: Christopher Jones (actor, born 1941)
item.description: William Frank Jones (August 18, 1941 â€“ January 31, 2014), known professionally as Christopher Jones, was an American actor. He was best known for his starring roles in the films Wild in the Streets (1968) and Ryan's Daughter (1970), and for playing the title role in the 1960s television series The Legend of Jesse James. According to The New York Times, Jones' "talent and star power drew comparisons with James Dean," and he "seemed poised for stardom before abruptly abandoning his movie career in the late 1960s."
